interpretation:
The "goggles" card represents the need for clarity and protection in a situation. This emoji suggests that the querent may need to put on their "goggles" and take a closer look at what is going on around them. It may be time to analyze things from a different perspective or to shield oneself from potential harm. 

In a reading, the "goggles" card may indicate that the querent needs to approach a situation with a level head and carefully consider their options before proceeding. It may also suggest that the querent needs to protect themselves from negative influences or harmful situations. Overall, this card encourages the querent to take a closer look at what is going on around them and make informed decisions based on what they observe.
